com.iha.emulator.control

Class SensorController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.iha.emulator.control.SensorController

  • public class SensorController
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates and controls sensor. Also contains all list of emulated values, time for sensor and logic to generate new values.
    Author:
    Filip Sutovsky

    • Property Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Type Property and Description
      javafx.beans.property.BooleanProperty ignoreRefreshChange
      Gets flag, if refresh time set by server should be ignored ( used in "Performance simulation") property, that can be bound
      javafx.beans.property.BooleanProperty timerRunning
      Gets timer status property, that can be bound

    • Constructor Detail

      • SensorController

        public SensorController(AdapterController adapterController,
                        Sensor model)
                 throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        Creates new instance of sensor's controller for adapter given as parameter and with model given as parameter
        Parameters:
        adapterController - adapter containing new instance of sensor
        model - model of new sensor
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if model is null

      • SensorController

        public SensorController(AdapterController adapterController,
                        SensorPanelPresenter panel,
                        Sensor model)
                 throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        Creates new instance of sensor's controller with sensor GUI representation for adapter given as parameter and with model given as parameter. Bind timerRunningProperty with methods used to start and stop timer.
        Parameters:
        adapterController - adapter containing new instance of sensor
        panel - GUI representation of sensor
        model - model of new sensor
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if model is null

    • Method Detail

      • enable

        public void enable()
        If no critical error occurred previously, enables sensor.

      • disable

        public void disable()
        If no critical error occurred previously, disables sensor.

      • startTimer

        public void startTimer()
        Starts sensor's timer every half of sensor's refresh time.

      • stopTimer

        public void stopTimer()
        Stops timer, if running.

      • delete

        public void delete()
        Deletes model.

      • initializeTimer

        private void initializeTimer()
        Initializes new timer for sensor.

      • timerEngine

        private void timerEngine()
        Method providing logic for generating and saving message to adapter's unsent list. In half of sensor's refresh time method decides, if new values should be generated or message should be saved.

      • changeValue

        public void changeValue(java.lang.String typeString,
                        java.lang.String offsetString,
                        java.lang.String valueString)
                 throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Method used to change actuator value by server.
        Parameters:
        typeString - type of value from server message
        offsetString - offset of value in sensor from server message
        valueString - new value from server message
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - cannot change given value, more info in exception message

      • criticalErrorStop

        public void criticalErrorStop(java.lang.String fullMessage,
                              java.lang.String shortMessage,
                              OutMessage message)
        When critical error occurred on sensor, it is disabled and cannot run anymore. This prevents more errors when for example message is wrong, or there is server error and messages from it are damaged.
        Parameters:
        fullMessage - message containing adapter information to be shown to user
        shortMessage - message containing only sensor information to be shown to user
        message - sent message that created error

      • setNewRefreshTime

        public void setNewRefreshTime(int refreshTime)
        Sets new refresh time for sensor, also restarts timer with new time.
        Parameters:
        refreshTime - new refresh time

      • resetTimer

        private void resetTimer(int refreshTime)
        Resets timer and sets new wake up time given as parameter.
        Parameters:
        refreshTime - new refresh time

      • saveToXML

        public void saveToXML(org.dom4j.Element rootElement)
        Creates Dom4j XML element in given document. Saves all information sensor and it's values needed for later loading of this sensor.
        Parameters:
        rootElement - root element for sensor's element

        public SensorPanelPresenter getPanel()

        GUI representation of sensor, null if panel doesn't exist.

      • isValueGeneratorRunning

        public boolean isValueGeneratorRunning()
        Gets value generation mode
        Returns:
        true if new value should be generated, false if message should be sent to adapter

      • setRunValueGenerator

        public void setRunValueGenerator(boolean runValueGenerator)
        Sets value generation mode
        Parameters:
        runValueGenerator - true if new value should be generated, false if message should be sent to adapter

      • isFullMessage

        public boolean isFullMessage()
        Gets sensor's log message mode
        Returns:
        true if message should contain information about adapter, false if message should contain only information about sensor

      • setFullMessage

        public void setFullMessage(boolean fullMessage)
        Sets sensor's log message mode
        Parameters:
        fullMessage - true if message should contain information about adapter, false if message should contain only information about sensor

      • getIgnoreRefreshChange

        public boolean getIgnoreRefreshChange()
        Gets flag, if refresh time set by server should be ignored ( used in "Performance simulation")
        Returns:
        true refresh time from server is ignored, false otherwise

        Gets flag, if refresh time set by server should be ignored ( used in "Performance simulation") property, that can be bound
